Title: The Founder
Text:
You have 4 cards in your hand and you can trade cards with other players.

Only you can place Features or Milestones in the Product.

Title: The Scrum Master
Text: Whenever Tickets are placed on a Feature, you decide their order.

Title: The Architect
Text:
Discard 2 cards to do Refactoring.

Discard 3 cards and do Heavy Refactoring.

Title: The Manager
Text: When drawing cards at upkeep, draw 1 more, then put one at the bottom of the Player Deck.
Notes: Define upkeep strictly in the rules, it should only point to drawing a card from the Player Deck at the beginning of a turn.

Title: The 100x Engineer
Text: When placing counters on a single TECH Ticket, place +1d6 counters.

Title: The Generalist
Text: When placing counters, if you placed exactly 1 counter on each Ticket, place an extra counter on any Ticket.
